name: Son of a Cuya
description:
This game was made for the GMKT 2022 Game Jam in which the subject was "Roll of the Dice". The mechanics and design were inspired by the traditional "Tómbola del Cuy", a game played in fairs in Perú. The original idea and most (99%) of programming was made by ReyRamiroIII and I mostly contributed with the particle effects for winning and did the 3D modeling and visuals and collaborated with some design ideas.

Music by tyops at Freesound.org
